radiographic_examinations.findings: Positive for intra-erythrocytic inclusions consistent with Babesia and positive for B. microti DNA by PCR.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient had initial negative blood smears after treatment; however, one month later, he developed worsening hemolytic anemia with a Babesia parasitemia of 0.3%. Following re-initiation of treatment, there was increasing parasitemia up to 1% before further changes occurred with the four-drug regimen over time.
